title: Boncafe - Pregolan
name: Widianti Gunawan Wijaya
text:
Kemarin kantor saya mengadakan acara di Boncafe cabang Pregolan Bunder, dan saya ikut membantu koordinasi dengan pihak restorannya. Untuk acara grup, mereka menyediakan lantai 2 yang kapasitasnya sekitar 70–75 orang. Tempatnya memang sudah agak jadul dibanding lantai 1, tapi cukup fungsional karena sudah dilengkapi kamar mandi, audio system sederhana, dan projector, jadi praktis untuk meeting, gathering, atau acara kantor.

Salah satu hal yang saya suka, Boncafe sangat fleksibel dengan budget. Waktu itu kami punya budget Rp150.000 per orang, dan mereka bisa aturkan dengan baik. Minumnya disesuaikan (air putih), dan setiap orang mendapat pilihan 1 main course, plus 1 appetizer atau dessert. Pilihannya juga lumayan banyak. Mereka menyediakan opsi personal set, atau kalau mau konsep buffet juga bisa—meski buffet-nya lebih ke menu Chinese food.

Untuk rasa, Boncafe memang terkenal konsisten. Risolesnya enak, galantin juga tetap klasik—signature mereka. Hanya saja, entah karena sistem paket dan mungkin makanannya sudah disiapkan lebih awal, chicken stick yang saya pesan terasa tidak se-juicy biasanya kalau datang pribadi dan pesan langsung. Tapi secara keseluruhan, rasa tetap aman dan sesuai standar Boncafe.

Parkir di sini juga mudah. Ada layanan valet hanya Rp5.000, murah dan petugasnya sigap, jadi tidak perlu bingung cari tempat parkir.

Buat yang punya member Boncafe, jangan lupa dipakai ya—bisa dapat poin atau diskon lumayan.

Tempatnya nyaman yaa, tidak terlalu bising meskipun tempatnya ditengah kota, dan penataannya asri. Di area belakang ada area tmpt anak anak (kiss corner) yang dilengkapi ayunan. Pelayananya sopan dan ramah

Menurut saya tempat ini cocok untuk bersantap bersama pasangan, keluarga maupun rekan bisnis. Recommended dech

Boncafe has always been a special place to dine for many years. My fellow 90s kids who grew up in Surabaya would surely recognize Boncafe as one of the most renowned old school steakhouses in town with its flagship red and white colours, checkered table cloth and outdoor kids play area. Now that there have been more and more options to dine, I don't visit Boncafe as often as I did in the past, but I still could remember vividly how good Boncafe's steak was in the old days.

Boncafe still serves the same good ol' soft bread as starter. The bread is soft and yummy, especially when eaten with the slighty-salted butter on it (it’s already good on its own though), which will boost your appetite right from the start. The Sirloin Steak was well-marbled, marinated perfectly and grilled to perfection. It was tender, juicy and flavorful. The quality was good for the price and the portion was big as well. Meanwhile, the Chicken Roulade was nicely seasoned and the signature sauce helped elevate the flavor.

text:
Resto keluarga yang legendaris di Surabaya dengan menu makanan western. Salah satu jenis menu yang populer adalah steak. Ada banyak pilihan jenis daging, tapi yang direkomendasikan Tenderloin Premium Steak. Steaknya tipe klasik, disajikan di hotplate dengan tambahan kentang (goreng/mashed), kroket, sayuran rebus, dan saus khas Boncafe. Untuk tingkat kematangan bisa dipilih, begitu juga dengan jenis kentangnya, yang kadang lupa ditanyakan oleh pelayannya.
Tempat bersih dan suasananya enak dengan iringan musik yang pas buat dinner.
Tidak ada menu pork, dan selama ramadan menu yang pakai alkohol juga diganti. Ada free takjil berupa es aga-agar untuk setiap pelanggan.

text:
Lokasi di tengah kota, jadi mudah dicapai darimana saja. Bangunan dengan country style membuat suasananya semakin romantis di malam hari dan di siang hari, seperti di rumah sendiri. Steak dan beberapa macam makanan yang ditawarkan rasanya pas untuk lidah kita dengan harga yang tidak terlalu mahal. A really nice steakhouse!
The atmosphere and service were both great.
It was my first visit, and I ordered a premium sirloin steak.

The sauce was a bit on the sweet side.
Other than that, everything was pretty good!

title: Boncafe - Pregolan
name: Mariska Szabo
text:
Legendary steak in Surabaya that you should visit if: (1) you're rolling in cash, (2) you have never tried eating an Indonesian-style steak. An Indonesian-style steak is basically a hot plate with mushroom sauce, carrots, and longbean - serving as side dishes to a well done steak. If you have ever eaten a steak at a restaurant called Platinum, that is exactly what you're getting; except Boncafé's steak meat is of higher quality, and the fries are far superior in taste.

The food isn't bad, mind you, the steak is good, just not sure whether it's worth the price tag because service is nothing impressive when I visited and the meal was nothing particularly special. Most people who meet here seem to be families or groups meeting up to gather. I'd say try if you have the money, but it's honestly skip-able.

title: Boncafe - Pregolan
name: S.R. Nevercry
text: 저럼한 가격에 스테이크를 맛볼수 있다. 기대가 커서 그런지 고기 맛에는 실망했다. 참고로 이곳 스테이크의 일반과 프리미엄의 차이점은 양(Quantity)의 차이인것 같다. 티본스테이크와 안심스테이크(모두 프리미엄) 주문했다. 고기의 두께는 1Cm정도로 인도네시아화 된 스테이크 집이라 생각된다. 다만 가격이 저렴한 만큼 스테이크 본연의 맛보다는 시즈닝을 가미한 맛이 난다. 처음 스테이크를 가져올때부터 간이 되어 있는 느낌이다. 고기 굽기 정도는 미디엄이 먹고 싶다면 레어를 주문해야할듯 하다. (난 미디엄을 시켰는데 웰던수준) 직원들 친절하고 장소는 좋은데 고기 맛이 인도네시인화된 곳이라 생각하고 가면 된다. 가격을 생각하면 어느정도 먹을만 하다.

title: Boncafe - Pregolan
name: Jan A.S.
text:
Boncafe has western and Indonesian food choices. Nice food and space for family with children, company meetings, or hanging out with friends.
IF YOU EAT STEAKS:  you have to tell the chef how rare you want your steaks to be. Because one time, they cook our steaks SUPER well-done, they burnt it. It's completely black on the surface. We complained to the waiter & waitress but they didn't respond well (or even politely ask to change our steak).
We wasn't really happy that time but maybe one day we'll come back.
